document_title: Epididymitis: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content: Epididymitis is mainly an infection from pathogenic bacteria. Although epididymitis is not classified as a sexually transmitted disease, the disease can still be transmitted if you have unprotected sex. In particular, people with epididymitis as a result of a sexually transmitted disease are more likely to transmit the infection to others.
subsection_title: viem mao tinh hoan.json. Is epididymitis contagious?
subsection_data:
viem mao tinh hoan.json. Is epididymitis contagious?
Epididymitis is mainly an infection from pathogenic bacteria. Although epididymitis is not classified as a sexually transmitted disease, the disease can still be transmitted if you have unprotected sex. In particular, people with epididymitis as a result of a sexually transmitted disease are more likely to transmit the infection to others.
